price: 14. Baye wana nde bato ya lola, bakozalaka libela okati na yango, mpe bakofutamaka тропа maye basalaki.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا جَزَآءَۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: ulāika aṣḥābu al-janati khālidīna fīhā jazāan bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
